channel.title: Background
channel.description:
Hello again the all mighty server help section.. So i am working on a PK server with my friend, and when i was trying to change the client background to the picture my friend made, (in sprite.java because i couldn't seem to find the actual original background in the sprites folder...) this happened: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/d9c9d2e2e794941a6a826381d06cb311.png?1325151028[/img] *edit* the picture also got like reflected or something... the words are all backwards on one side but the other seems to be fine...
by the original background, i mean this: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/d9ce21c28eec5c9ff262cdbfc00e8b97.png?1325150131[/img]
Any ideas? :|
EDIT: [size=18pt]sorry, just realized this is in the wrong section. Didn't think to put in to Client Help.[/size]
